summary: This is an email chain from June 2020 between FBI and US Attorney's Office (NY) personnel discussing AT&T subscriber information for a phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell. The subscriber is listed under 'G Max' with an address in Manchester, MA, and the financial liable party is Scott Borgerson. The email suggests seeking a pen register/trap and trace order for the phone.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses AT&T subscriber information for a phone number believed to be one she is presently using, listed under 'G Max'.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Identified in the AT&T return as the financial liable party for the phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Scott Borgerson is identified as the financial liable party for a phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: AT&T subscriber information received
events.description: The FBI received AT&T return information for a phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell, showing subscriber 'G Max' and financial liable party Scott Borgerson.

keyFacts: In June 2020, investigators identified a phone number believed to be actively used by Ghislaine Maxwell.
The AT&T subscriber information for the phone was listed under the name 'G Max' at 301 Summer Street, Manchester, MA.
Scott Borgerson was identified as the financial liable party for this phone number.
The email discusses seeking a pen register/trap and trace order (a 'pen') for this phone.
The document shows ongoing investigative efforts to locate and monitor Ghislaine Maxwell prior to her arrest in July 2020.
